channel.title: Needing an Oak Log Buyer/Bank Runner/Plank runner
channel.description:
Hello I am currently on F2P buying oak logs from general stores for 6gp each I walk to the bank with 16k in inventory, nothing else. Buy full inventory of Oak logs, then walk back to the bank
Then after I recieve about 10k logs, I run back and forth to the Varrock Lumber Mill And have my logs turned into Oak planks for 250 each, They sell on forums in bulk 550 each
You won't believe how long and boring this process is So, Since its F2P, Why not auto?
I am looking for a script that will do the following:
> Walk to general store > Trade shop keeper > Buy '10' oak logs (3 Times) > Walk to bank > Bank oak logs > (Repeat)
And then another script that will do the following:
> Withdraw 'All' oak logs (Till full inventory) > Walk to 'Lumber mill' > Buy plank 'Sawmill Operator' > Buy 'All' Oak plank > Walk to bank > (Repeat)
I'd really appreciate it if someone could make these scripts They'd make everyone loads of money on the Construction forums :)

item.title: Needing an Oak Log Buyer/Bank Runner/Plank runner
item.dc:creator: @paulboyce3 paulboyce3
item.description:
@paulboyce3 wrote:

Withdraw ‘All’ oak logs (Till full inventory)
Walk to ‘Lumber mill’
Buy plank ‘Sawmill Operator’
Buy ‘All’ Oak plank
Walk to bank
(Repeat)

for this i will pay 500k

Read full topic
item.source: Needing an Oak Log Buyer/Bank Runner/Plank runner

item.title: Needing an Oak Log Buyer/Bank Runner/Plank runner
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Monk Mopar Monk
item.description:
@Mopar_Monk wrote:

Hello
I am currently on F2P buying oak logs from general stores for 6gp each
I walk to the bank with 16k in inventory, nothing else.
Buy full inventory of Oak logs, then walk back to the bank

Then after I recieve about 10k logs, I run back and forth to the Varrock Lumber Mill
And have my logs turned into Oak planks for 250 each, They sell on forums in bulk 550 each

You won’t believe how long and boring this process is
So, Since its F2P, Why not auto?

I am looking for a script that will do the following:

Walk to general store
Trade shop keeper
Buy ‘10’ oak logs (3 Times)
Walk to bank
Bank oak logs
(Repeat)

And then another script that will do the following:

Withdraw ‘All’ oak logs (Till full inventory)
Walk to ‘Lumber mill’
Buy plank ‘Sawmill Operator’
Buy ‘All’ Oak plank
Walk to bank
(Repeat)

I’d really appreciate it if someone could make these scripts
They’d make everyone loads of money on the Construction forums
